package_desc:
Rixos The Palm Dubai

A short distance from Dubai’s world-famous attractions, shopping centers and commercial hubs, Rixos The Palm Dubai is among the leading multi-concept luxury hotels in the UAE. Right on a picturesque beach, it offers a range of modern amenities and warm Arabian hospitality to ensure you have a mesmeric holiday in Dubai.


At Rixos The Palm Dubai, you can take your pick from ultra-all-inclusive, Half-board, and B & B – designed to cater different needs of its guests who want to enjoy their renowned hospitality during their Dubai trip. Each of its 230 rooms and suites is designed keeping the utmost guest comforts in mind. Add to it a range of amenities like spa, swimming pool, kids club, and various beach activities, and you get a complete Dubai holiday at Rixos The Palm. Captivating views of the surrounding Arabian Gulf, and the iconic Burj Khalifa make your stay unforgettable. No wonder, Rixos The Palm Dubai is rated among the top best-value hotels in Dubai.

itinerary.itinerary:
Day: 1

Get ready for your dream Dubai Holiday. Upon arrival, check-in to the hotel, and relax in your nicely-appointed room. If time allows, explore the wonderful surroundings of the hotel. Enjoy shopping and dining in the historic Bur Dubai.


Day: 2/3

Dubai boasts plenty of world-class attractions, which draw holidaymakers from far and wide. From world’s largest shopping mall to the tallest structure o the earth, and biggest ever man-made island to the most spectacular hotels and skyscrapers – you’re literally spoilt for choice when it comes to the things to do and see in Dubai.

For adventure lovers, there is an unmatched thrill of Desert Safari and world-class rides and slides in the IMG World of Adventure. Sandy beaches are perfect to enjoy sea, sun and sands.


Day: 4

Bid adieu to the dazzling emirate, hopefully with the memories of a lifetime. Complete the check-out formalities, and head to the airport for your return flights.
